title: Welcome to My Second Blog Post!
excerpt: It's been about three weeks since my last post (school started, and everything flipped upside down). Not much has happened personally, but on the career front, there's been a lot of movement: we're officially in peak hiring season—especially for internships.

title: AI Is No Longer the Future — It's the Now
excerpt: Everyone says, "AI is the future!" I disagree. AI was the future — now it's the present, and it's here to stay. My journey grinding for big tech jobs and what I've learned about ATS, OAs, and building a focused skill set.
